Guidance on Data Masking for Employee Files When redacting personal data from personnel files for audit purposes, ensure that postal codes are treated as sensitive identifiers. For example, an address like E14 6HD should not be partially obscured unless it can still be uniquely re-identified. The new GDPR guidelines classify such details as personal data even when stripped of names. Please review your current template and revert with a revised version by Tuesday.

We recommend HR departments encourage this practice and update systems accordingly. For example, Box 1407, 1200 Commerce Street, Sydney should be treated as the official mailing destination. To remain compliant with data protection regulations, we require a certified copy of your current residence proof. Acceptable documents include a council tax bill, mortgage statement, or driver’s license with your full address. Please send these to hr-compliance@company.com by close of business Thursday.
